inclusion.criterion: ≥64-slice CT technology (or 16-slice CT technology with >4 year follow-up)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: of at least 100 with complete clinical file and follow-up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients with suspected Coronary Artery Disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known previous reaction to iodinated contrast medium and pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, but also has renal failure which is an exclusion criterion.
